vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κολλούρ-ιον, τό,
diminutive of {κολλούρα}, [Refs 3rd c.AD+].
__II κολλύριον, see: κολλούριον.
κολλούριον
(TTr., κολλύ-, the more usual form), -ου, τό (dimin. of κολλύρα = κόλλιξ, a coarse bread roll), [in LXX: 3Ki.12:24 hil B* ;]
__1. a small bread roll (LXX, lines with).
__2. (Usually in plural, LS, see word) an eye salve shaped like a roll: Rev.3:18.†
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: thuốc nhỏ mắt; thuốc xức mắt; thuốc tra mắt
